import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{useState}from'react';import{LC,NC,SC,UC}from'./Data/char';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){let[uppercase,setUppercase]=useState(false);let[lowercase,setLowercase]=useState(false);let[number,setNumber]=useState(false);let[symbol,setSymbol]=useState(false);let[passwordLen,setPasswordLen]=useState(10);let[fpass,setFpass]=useState();let genreatePass=()=>{let charSet='';let finalPass='';if(uppercase||lowercase||number||symbol){if(uppercase)charSet+=UC;if(lowercase)charSet+=LC;if(number)charSet+=NC;if(symbol)charSet+=SC;console.log(charSet);for(let i=0;i<passwordLen;i++){finalPass+=charSet.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random()*charSet.length));}setFpass(finalPass);}else{alert("Please selete on checkbox..");}};let copyPass=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(fpass);//for copy the text on the clipboard..
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"passwordBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Password Generator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"passwordIn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",readOnly:true,value:fpass}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:copyPass,children:"Copy"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"passwordLen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password length"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:10,max:20,value:passwordLen,onChange:event=>setPasswordLen(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Include uppercase letter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:uppercase,onChange:()=>setUppercase(!uppercase)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Include lowercase letter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:lowercase,onChange:()=>setLowercase(!lowercase)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Include numbers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:number,onChange:()=>setNumber(!number)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Include special characters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:symbol,onChange:()=>setSymbol(!symbol)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:genreatePass,children:"Generate"})})]})});}export default App;
